vision.notes: Information on vision in Pyrgomatidae barnacles is not available from the provided context.

chemoreception.notes: Barnacles generally use chemoreception to detect food and suitable settlement locations. This is inferred to be present in Pyrgomatidae, though specifics are unknown from the context.

mechanoreception.notes: Barnacles are likely to have mechanoreceptors to detect water currents and substrate vibrations. This is inferred to be present in Pyrgomatidae, though specifics are unknown from the context.
